head_strength.description: When dealing direct damage with Basic Attacks, increases Physical Damage by 20% for 6s. Trigger Interval: 30s
When taking damage at below 30% HP, increases Damage Resistance by 50% for 6s. Trigger Interval: 60s

When dealing direct Basic Attack Damage, creates a Flame Star around the caster, lasting 6s. Reduces enemies' Magic Resistance by 50% (Magic Resistance Reduction), and deals [Damage Rate: 50%] Magic Damage every 1s. Trigger Interval: 30s
When affected by hard control effects (Stun, Fear, Deep Freeze, Knockup, Petrify): Gains a [Target-based Max HP 25%] shield for 6s. Trigger Interval: 30s Skill

When dealing direct Basic Attack Damage, triggers an EMP blast at current position. After 1s, deals [Damage Rate: 250%] Physical Damage to enemies within 6m, Stuns them for 1s and reduces their damage dealt by 20% for 6s Trigger Interval: 30s
When dealing direct Basic Attack Damage, creates a sandstorm around the caster, lasting 6s. Enemies within 6m are slowed by 40% and disarmed. Trigger Interval: 30s

When affected by Immobilize or Forced Movement (Knockback, Pull): Immediately removes all Immobilize, Slow and Forced Movement effects, and increases Damage Resistance by 25%, grants immunity to Slow, Immobilize, and Forced Movement for 8s. Trigger Interval: 30s.

chest_strength.description: Channels for 2.5s, increasing Damage Resistance by 90%. Can move during channeling but Speed is reduced by -90%
> Grants a shield with [Target-based Max HP 20%] Shield Value to nearby allies for 6s. When HP is below 40%, the Shield Value increases to [Target-based Max HP 35%].
Deals [Damage Rate: 300%] Physical Damage to nearby enemies, stunning them for 1.5s and reducing their Speed by 40% for 4s.
Sounds a war horn, lasting 5s. Allies within 7m gain 30% Damage Resistance, 50 Control Resistance, and immunity to Forced Movement effects (Knockback, Pull).
Shoots a grappling rope that deals [Damage Rate: 100%] Physical Damage to the target, Immobilizes them for 2s, and pulls both toward the middle.
Increases Damage Resistance by 30% and creates a weakening field around the caster, lasting 6s. Enemies within 7m deal 80% less damage and cannot enter Stealth.
Creates a converging force field. After 1.5s, deals Damage Rate: 250%] Physical Damage to enemies within 7m, pulls them to the center, Stuns them for 0.5s, and Slows them by 30% for 4s.

boots_strength.description: Increases Movement Speed by 50% and restores [Healing Rate: 20%] HP every second for 5s.

boots_strength.changes:
- Movement Speed per Stack: 25% → 17.5%
- Damage Increase per Stack: 7% → 4.5%
- Duration: 6s → 5s
- Max Stacks: 5 → 7
boots_strength.description: For every 10% HP lost, gains 1 stack of Movement Speed Increase by 17.5% and damage by 4.5% for 5s. Stacks up to 7 times.
Leap to the target location. Upon landing, grants [Target-based Max HP 22%] Shield to nearby allies for 6s.
Enhances Movement Speed by 30%, Max HP and Current HP by 80%, and grants Immunity to Forced Movement (Pull, Knockback) for 6s.
Remove Slow and immobilize effects. Increases Movement Speed by 80% and gains immunity to Slow and immobilize effects for 4s.

Charges forward 5 times, dealing [Damage Rate: 50%]. Physical Damage to enemies in path and knocking them back 4m each time. If knocked into terrain, enemies are stunned for 2s. Immune to control effects and gains +80% Damage. Resistance while charging.

Leaps to the target location, dealing [Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage and inflicting Knockup for 1s to enemies upon landing. Then adjusts direction and leaps again toward the target, dealing another [Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage and inflicting Knockup for 1s on enemies upon landing. During the skill's duration, immune to control effects and gains +80% Damage Resistance.

head_dexterity.description:
When taking damage at below 30% HP, immediately
restores [Healing Rate: 40%] HP every second for 5s.
Trigger Interval: 60s

When using Basic Attack, the next 5 Basic Attacks
(including the triggering one) within 8s cast additional
Chain Lightning onto enemy targets. Upon hitting, it
automatically ricochets to the nearest target, up to 5
times, dealing [Damage Rate: 60%] Physical Damage per
hit. (Trigger Interval: 0.6 seconds)
Damage is influenced by Basic Attack damage boost and
can crit based on Basic Attack critical rate.
Cooldown: 30s

When taking damage at below 30% HP, instantly enters
Stealth and increases Movement Speed by 30% for 5s.
After 1.5 seconds in Stealth, using a skill, dealing
damage, or inflicting healing will break Stealth.
Trigger Interval: 60s

When taking damage from Basic Attacks, immediately
gains +70% Dodge Enhancement for 6s.
Trigger Interval: 25

When dealing direct damage with Basic Attacks, grants
+10% Critical Rate and +35% Attack Speed for 9s.
Trigger Interval: 25s

When taking damage at below 20% HP, prevents HP from
falling below 1 and regenerates [Healing Rate: 30%] HP
every second for 4s. Cannot be dispelled.
Trigger Interval: 120s

When affected by hard control effects (Stun, Fear, Freeze,
Knockup, Petrify, Sleep), Silence, or Immobilize:
Instantly removes all control effects and debuffs, and
grants immunity to control effects and Silence, and
increases Speed by 25% for 4s.
Trigger Interval: 45s.

chest_dexterity.description:
Channel for 5s, recovering [Healing Rate: 70%] HP every
second.
Can move slowly while channeling

Deals [Damage Rate: 100%] True Damage to nearby
enemies. Damage increases by 15% for every 10% HP the
target is missing.

Increases Damage Resistance by 30% for 6s. During this
time, reflects 100% of damage taken as Magic Damage to
the attacker.

Creates a 12m smoke screen, lasting 6s. Enter Stealth for
6s. Every 0.5s in the smoke screen grants 1 stack of +60%
Attack Speed for the next Basic Attack, lasting 6s. Stacks
up to 8 times.
Using a skill, causing direct healing or damage, or leaving
the smoke clears the smoke and removes stealth.

Snarls toward the target direction, dealing [Damage Rate:
200%] Physical Damage to enemies in range. Reduces
their Movement Speed by 40%, damage dealt by 50%, and
disables Stealth for 5s

chest_dexterity.changes:
- Duration of Damage Resistance Reduction: 8s → 6s
- Duration of Damage Increase: 8s → 6s
- Damage Increase: 12% → 15%
chest_dexterity.description:
Deals [Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage to nearby
enemies, reduces their Damage Resistance by 20% for 6s
and increases own damage by 15% for 6s

Creates a Rally aura around the caster, lasting 9s
Allies within 7m gain +30% Attack Speed and +30%
Cooldown Speed

boots_dexterity.description:
Step 9m toward target direction. Increases Movement
Speed by 40% for 4s.

Increases Movement Speed by 60% and Attack Speed by
45% for 6s.

Dashes 6m in target direction. Gains 15% Critical Rate for
5s. Stacks up to 2 times.
Can be used again within 4s.

Quickly dash behind target, dealing [Damage Rate: 150%]
Physical Damage and increasing Basic Attack Damage by
40% for 6s.
Gains 1 charge every 20s, up to 2 charges

Increases Movement Speed by 30%, enters Stealth after
1s, gaining +60% Movement Speed for 4s.
Using a skill, dealing damage or inflicting healing breaks
Stealth

Remove control effects and dash toward target direction.
Gain Control Immunity for 2s.
Can be used while skills are disabled

Leave a mark at current position and dash to the target
location. Upon arrival, deal [Damage Rate: 200%] Physical
Damage to enemies in range and reduce their Damage
Resistance by 15% for 4s. Can be cast again within 5
seconds to return to original position and gain 40%
Movement Speed for 3s.

head_intelligence.description:
When casting skills, increases Magic Damage dealt by
20% for 6s
Trigger Interval: 30s

When healing, grants target a [Target-based Max HP 20%]
shield for 6s
Trigger Interval: 20s

When the skill damages an enemy target, it triggers an
explosion at their location, dealing [Damage Rate: 180%]
Magic Damage to enemies in range and reducing their
healing received by 25% for 6s.
Trigger Interval: 25s.

When skills deal direct damage, creates a poison zone
lasting 6s. Enemies within 5m take [Damage Rate: 25%]
Magic Damage every second and have their Magic
Resistance reduced by 20%.
Trigger Interval: 30s

When casting skills with MP below 40%, gains 10 MP
every second for 8s.
Trigger Interval: 45s

When taking damage at below 40% HP, gains a
[Target-based Max HP 25%] shield and generates a
repulsion field lasting 6s. Enemies touching the field take
Damage Rate: 100%] Magic Damage and are knocked
back 7m.
Trigger Interval: 45s

When damage taken within 3s exceeds 35% of max HP,
creates a healing wave that restores [Healing Rate: 200%]
HP to nearby allies and removes control effects.
Trigger Interval: 45s

chest_intelligence.description:
Instantly restores [Healing Rate: 100%] HP to nearby
allies.

Immediately removes all control effects, restores 
[Healing Rate: 150%] HP, and grants Control Immunity for 2s.
Can be used while skills are disabled

Creates a 7m radius Mana Font around the caster, lasting 6s
Restores 10 MP to allies in range every 1s
Increases casting speed of friendly units within by 80%

Launches a dispel projectile that deals [Damage Rate:
120%] Magic Damage to enemies in the impact area,
removes all buffs and Shield effects. Reduces target's physical damage dealt by 40%

chest_intelligence.changes:
- Added Disarm Effect for 4 seconds
- Cooldown 40s → 30s
chest_intelligence.description:
Deals [Damage Rate: 200%] Magic Damage to nearby
enemies, disarms them for 4s and knocks them back 10m, and reduces their
Movement Speed by 40% for 4s.

Gains a [Target-based Max HP 45%] shield for 6s. While
the shield exists, restores 20 MP each time taking
damage.

Creates a panic curse field around the caster that lasts
6s
Enemies within 6m who use skills take [Damage Rate:
200%] Magic Damage and are affected by Fear for 1.5s

boots_intelligence.description:
Increases Movement Speed by 50% and restores 8 MP
every second for 5s.

Move 12m in target direction. Restore [Healing Rate:
150%] HP and 20 MP.

Increases Movement Speed by 55% for 5s. Creates a frost
path that lasts 4s. Enemies in the path are slowed by 40%
and their Attack Speed is reduced by 45% for 2s.

Increases Movement Speed by 55%, lasting 5s; creates a
path of corruption lasting 4s along movement path.
Enemies in the path suffer 35% reduced damage dealt and
30% reduced healing received for 5s.

Grants a [Target-based Max HP 25%] shield lasting 4s and
swaps positions with target player.

After 1.5s cast time, enters Ghost Form, increases
Movement Speed by 70% and becomes immune to
damage and control effects for 4s. Cannot cast other
skills or attack while in Ghost form.

Increases Movement Speed by 70% and damage by 20%
for 6s.
When effect ends, reduces Damage Resistance by 15% for 4s
